verses.verse: [To the chiefe musition vpon Neginoth of Dauid.] Heare my crying O Lorde: geue eare vnto my prayer.
From the endes of the earth I wyll call vnto thee when my heart is in heauines: oh set me vp on the rocke that is higher then I.
For thou hast ben my hope: [and] a strong towre [for me] against the face of the enemie.
I wyll dwell in thy tabernacle for euer: my trust shalbe vnder the couering of thy wynges. Selah.
For thou O Lorde hast hearde my vowes: and hast geuen an heritage vnto those that feare thy name.
Thou wilt adde dayes vnto the kings dayes: and his yeres shalbe a generation and a generation.
He shall dwell before the Lorde for euer: O appoynt thy louing mercy and faithfulnes, that thei may preserue him.
So wyll I sing psalmes vnto thy name: that I may day by day perfourme my vowes.
